presentation.description: I'm a web developer who focuses on building responsive full-stack applications with great user experiences

about.para: After receiving a bachelor's degree in mechatronics engineering from Universidad La Salle Noroeste, I started working on a university-funded project, an interactive large desk that included multiple games for kids with learning disabilities. I worked on the software part of the project, and after finishing the project I knew that I wanted to work on the software side of things.

In 2021 I heard about the Full Stack open course imparted by the University of Helsinki, but it wasn't until 2022 that I enrolled, started to develop my own applications, and learned different tools along the way (Astrojs,NextJS and TailWindCSS are the most popular tools for developing my own applications).
